author: remm
msg: - Now handles the case where File.list() returns null. This fixes some rare NPE
cases. That problem was already fixed in 4.1.

author: remm
msg: - Make the DAV collection enumeration code more robust. This is the
equivalent to what was done in TC 4.1.

author: remm
msg: - Add a null check to the isEncodable method.
This may resolve bug #766 if it was caused by a programmer error.

author: remm
msg: - Add a Microsoft specific header in response to OPTIONS request, mirroring
Should enhance compatibility with older MS clients.

author: remm
msg: - Don't try to read parameters if stream has been opened before.
